long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of opening a new tab and being greeted with the same old boring page? Do you wish you could have a little bit of inspiration and motivation every time you start a new browsing session? Look no further! Our chrome extension is here to help. Every time you open a new tab, you’ll be greeted with a fresh piece of advice to help guide you through your day.

We know that life can be tough and sometimes all it takes is a little push in the right direction to get back on track. That’s why we’ve made it our mission to provide you with the tools you need to succeed.

But our extension isn’t just about providing advice. It’s also about making your browsing experience more enjoyable. We’ve designed our extension to be visually appealing and easy to use. You’ll love the clean and simple interface that makes it easy to find the advice you need when you need it.

And the best part? Our extension is completely free! We believe that everyone should have access to the tools they need to succeed, and we don’t think that should come with a price tag. So go ahead and give our extension a try. We’re confident that you’ll love it as much as we do.

In summary, our chrome extension provides fresh advice every time you open a new tab, curated by comedy experts and designed to inspire and motivate you. It’s visually appealing, easy to use, and best of all, it’s completely free!
